description: Product Description What materials are used in the construction of these watering cans? Our watering cans are crafted from recycled polyethylene using an injection moulding process, ensuring both environmental responsibility and exceptional durability for long-term use. What size options are available for purchase? We offer a range of sizes from 5 litres to 10 litres, allowing you to choose the perfect capacity for your specific needs, whether you're tending to indoor houseplants or maintaining a large garden. How does the watering can handle delicate plants? The detachable rose head provides gentle, even water distribution perfect for delicate plants and seedlings, while the precision spout allows for controlled direct watering when needed. Is this watering can suitable for both indoor and outdoor use? Yes! The weather-resistant construction and versatile design make it perfect for both indoor and outdoor applications, while maintaining its durability in various environmental conditions. What makes this watering can comfortable to use? The ergonomic design features a wraparound handle and balanced weight distribution, combined with a lightweight yet sturdy build, making it comfortable for extended periods of use.
